scripts.reset: cross-env MYSQL_DB=shopper npx sequelize db:drop --env development && cross-env MYSQL_DB=shopper npx sequelize db:create --env development && cross-env MYSQL_DB=shopper npx sequelize db:migrate --env development && cross-env MYSQL_DB=shopper npx sequelize db:seed:all --env development
scripts.admin-drop: cross-env MYSQL_DB=admin npx sequelize db:drop --env development
scripts.admin-create: cross-env MYSQL_DB=admin npx sequelize db:create --env development
scripts.admin-migrate: cross-env MYSQL_DB=admin npx sequelize db:migrate --env development
scripts.admin-seed: cross-env MYSQL_DB=admin npx sequelize db:seed:all --env development
scripts.prod-reset: cross-env MYSQL_DB=shopper npx sequelize db:drop --env production && cross-env MYSQL_DB=shopper npx sequelize db:create --env production && cross-env MYSQL_DB=shopper npx sequelize db:migrate --env production && cross-env MYSQL_DB=shopper npx sequelize db:seed:all --env production
scripts.prod-admin-drop: cross-env MYSQL_DB=admin npx sequelize db:drop --env production
scripts.prod-admin-create: cross-env MYSQL_DB=admin npx sequelize db:create --env production
scripts.prod-admin-migrate: cross-env MYSQL_DB=admin npx sequelize db:migrate --env production
scripts.prod-admin-seed: cross-env MYSQL_DB=admin npx sequelize db:seed:all --env production
